storyInfo: During their brief respite, the Infected knights discuss their future. Maria proceeds to help fix her sister's armor, only to come across Nightmare Knight, still disgruntled by the abrupt interruption of his brawl.

attributes.content: Our champion, having appeared out of nowhere, has put a stop to the battle with a thunderous momentum!
attributes.name: A Voice on the Broadcast

attributes.content: Last night's match was cut short when Nightmare Knight's Arts were ruled a violation, and the one who stopped things from getting even further out of hand was the hero, the Blood Knight!
attributes.name: A Voice on the Broadcast

attributes.content: The match between the Radiant Knight and Nightmare Knight ended in a tie, and Nightmare will be facing the Blood Knight, whose opponent has dropped out, in his next round—
attributes.name: A Voice on the Broadcast

attributes.content: A tie...? Nightmare broke the rules. Shouldn't they have promoted the Radiant Knight to the next round?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: They don't want to let an Infected to just move up the ranks like that, of course.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Where's Szewczyk?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: He's with his family. Give him some time.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: To be honest... I didn't really care much about him to begin with.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We can tell.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: True enough. Were you trying to hide it?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: He's still alive, real flesh and blood, right?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The city makes us forget it a lot... but we're all alive.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We should have our own choices, our own lives... instead of drifting about in the endlessly beating waves, never to find out who we really are.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: The battle of a lifetime between the Blood Knight and Nightmare Knight will begin tomorrow evening!
attributes.name: A Voice on the Broadcast

attributes.content: Be sure to tune into the Night of Knights channel tomorrow at 8 o'clock for the best competition experience!
attributes.name: A Voice on the Broadcast

attributes.content: (Loud beeping noises)
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Oh... Justice! You're okay!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona! You can't get up yet.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Come, I'll help you.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Heh... Thanks, Ashley.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I thought I had exclusive rights to the nickname Ashley?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Haha, let me borrow it for a while.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You're gonna have to pay for using my trademark.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Iwona, that day...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Yeah, I saw the Blood Knight's silhouette.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: There were traces of blood Arts...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: It's... a really awful kind of Arts. As things are, just casting normal Arts is enough to make me ache. I can't imagine how much pain the Blood Knight has to bear, controlling Arts like that.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The Blood Knight... He's strong.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Everybody knows.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It's thanks to the Blood Knight that the Infected won the right to fight in the Major.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: We became the K.G.C.C.'s playthings... We lost our dignity and freedom... but we're still alive.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: It's only by staying alive that we have the chance to run.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Between the Radiant Knight and the Blood Knight, who do you support, girls?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The Blood Knight. No doubt about it. He's the one who opened up the future for us Infected.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But what we need is an unflagging fight instead of the status quo... so I choose the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: And you?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: I pick Sona.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: You can do that?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You called...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: The Board has made their decision... Area 0 will be wiped clean.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Our current strategy with the Infected is a mistake.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: A mistake, huh...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Moreover, Rhodes Island's leader has been digging too deep into the Area 0 affair. This is a lapse on the Armorless Union's part.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Several executive directors are strongly demanding the Armorless Union eradicate this threat. Do not let Rhodes Island's medical team leave Kazimierz alive.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Any issues?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: None... but this is only an order from 'several executive directors' and not the whole Board. Right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: That is not for you to question. We have authority over your command.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Point of order, it's Mr. Malkiewicz over there who has authority over me.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Malkiewicz... You know what to do.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Yeah... Probably when I blocked his strike.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I couldn't feel a thing at the time... but it might have bruised a bone or two.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hold still. Let me see...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You need a doctor. This will affect your performance.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maybe put some ice on it.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Can't we heal this with Arts?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: That will alleviate the pain and help the wound heal, but if she's got any broken bones, she could end up worse in the future if we don't take proper care of them.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What do we do? You're up against the Wind Knight the next match... That's a strong opponent. If you have to fight this hurt...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Don't worry so much.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: How am I supposed to not worry?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: It's just a minor injury. I'm more than used to this.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You call this... minor...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Margaret... You've worked so hard, and you've gotten so strong... What is it all for?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: To become a champion?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: 'You cannot surmount the rulesetters within their own rules.' Isn't that what Uncle said?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Mhm...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But that's just because Młynar—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: No, I get it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: He's right.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But it's not the rulesetters that we need to defeat.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We need to break free of the rules. We need to teach those who have been tamed to rise up, help those who have fallen to regain the light.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Uncle Młynar... He doesn't believe that there are still those who would follow a lighthouse's beam and charge into the storm.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But I don't agree with him.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: If we can dispel this darkness, the people will push forward.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You need to listen to the doctor and rest up for a few days.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Your next match is against the Wind Knight, right? If you don't recover by then, it won't go well for you.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Don't end up like me...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I knew my arm was no good, but I pushed myself even further. This is what I got.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Right. You needn't worry about me.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret... Look! Ta-dah!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The new gauntlet?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Already...? That's amazing. I thought it'd take you until tomorrow.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It probably would've taken me another two or three days if I was working by myself.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: We didn't adjust your gauntlet around your new weapon last time, not that we'd know where to start.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: But that taught us a lesson, and it really got Maria working.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Maria... I know some excellent craftsmen. Perhaps I should introduce them to you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Really?! Where are they from?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: All over. Ursus, Leithanien, Higashi, Laterano... you name it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Whoa... That's like a whole guild of master craftsmen... Hm? Why would a pharma company need so many craftsmen, though?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You'll just have to find out for yourself.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: This reminds me... there was this one year when Uncle Młynar bought you a small drone for your birthday.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You had the thing torn apart that afternoon.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I... I put it back together after that, though.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I was shocked, you know. It might not have flown again after she put it back together, but I never expected the kid to have such amazing talent—
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: —I half expected Maria to become a knight back then, though. Otherwise, I'd have entrusted her with my workshop.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: You better get on that, Kowal. Who knows when you'll kick the bucket?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Huh? Cursing me now, are you?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Do you want to pursue your interests, Maria?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Erm... I don't know yet.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hah, Maria's still young.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I just know that... it's been a very long time since we talked like this...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh! I forgot to bring the restoration gel!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: We still have to try out the new gauntlet... The match is coming up soon, isn't it? I'll head back to the workshop now!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Margaret... Those are some serious injuries...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hm? What's that noise?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Nightzmora drags his weapon across the floor, sending tiny sparks everywhere.
Enraged, he mutters to himself. He has made his way here following only the smell of the light.
—Aaah?!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ngh...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You... You are not her... Right, you are her sister.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Where is she?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: —! You want Margaret! Why?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Our battle has not yet ended.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: But the match's over!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The match...?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: My Khaganquest's purpose is not a mere match in a competition.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight is an essential part of this path... Our holy battle should not have been interrupted!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Then you just have to defeat the Blood Knight and fight my sister the next round—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Competitions... The Major... They are all for show.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You heard the rules, you heard the crowd! Couldn't you feel how laughable and blasphemous it all was?!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Is this the Major? What is it you won? What did you get from all this?
Glory, wealth, your family's honor, but what is it you're missing...? Hm, what is it you're missing?
And without much time to think about it, as if in pure response to the cheering all around her, Maria holds her sword up high.
Only the pain, sharp, radiating from her hand, overcomes the applause.
Do not take me for a jester entertaining the masses!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I am a descendant of the Kheshig. I must complete my Khaganquest!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Stand aside, I have no interest in frail children! The only business I have is for the Radiant Knight—
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I won't let you pass.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You...?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You are nothing but a retainer of the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A... A retainer?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Your dream is taken from another. Your conviction is borrowed.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You use your young age as an excuse for your confusion... but what point is there?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: The world can laugh at the Radiant Knight's stubbornness, but no one may refute the strength in her actions.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Yet you... you are not even a knight.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Now stand aside, lest my blade slice your throat open.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I won't let you see my sister.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Is she hiding? No... With her brilliant light, the Radiant Knight is above that...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Then... is she injured?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You mean to tell me I injured her in our fight, and I must wait until she recovers before our next match?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Shameless!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Nngh––!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (So heavy—That's heavier than Tytus's lance strikes!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Haahh... haaahh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Why am I...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Look at you... already drowned in fear...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You cannot wield your weapon in front of me. If we had met on the battlefield, you would already be dead.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: This... has nothing to do with knights.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I just want... to protect... my sister—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight is not for you to protect, you ignorant pegasus...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Guh!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: This arrow... A far cry from that blue archer.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Step away from the child, Nightzmora.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Batbayar...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Will you stand in my way too?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Maria! Quick, stand up! Come over here!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: R-Right!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Are you nuts?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: This is not the first time you asked me this question.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I thought... at least you would...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You have nowhere to go, kid.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Tell me, where is your Khagan?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Where is the Kheshig's banner? Where are their tents?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: It's been a thousand years... Why live in that past? Why chase that tradition?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: What can all that bring you, kid?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Tola.
Your name means 'grasslands.'
You must take pride in your bloodline.
Whensoever and wheresoever you stand, you must take pride in yourself.
Tola.
You must live as a normal Kuranta. This is very simple.
Study, grow up, learn a trade, and marry a beautiful wife.
Batbayar, I made up my mind when my mother died to the fangs of a wild beast.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: It was this nightmare of mine... that made me a Nightzmora.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What kind of nonsense are you on about—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I have struggled for years... in this country of knights.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Yet, in the end, I was guided to this path to fulfill my last ideals.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Hold on... hold on.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You can't seriously mean... your journey was all for—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Speak no more.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You are old and frail, but it does not change the fact you once stood on the battlefields. If you insist on standing in my way...
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Then I shall trample upon you and destroy one of my last remaining blood kin with my own hands.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Come. I shall charge you.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: What—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Master Vogelweide—Get out of there!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, are you okay?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I-I'm fine.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: We can't let this lunatic find Margaret... Or else—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You would stand in my way... So you will kill me?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Do knights of Kazimierz truly know what it means to fight to the death?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: No, you cannot possibly. Batbayar, you are old. And you, naive pegasus, you know nothing of the cruelty of the world.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You would interfere in my fight with her. You are sullying both our names and honor.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Honor doesn't matter at all!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: —Then what does your sister fight for?!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You dare spout such blasphemy?! You dare claim the Radiant Knight vies for the Major's title not to regain her glory?!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: *Whimpers*...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You heretic! Raise your weapon! You will pay the price!
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I... still won't let you pass!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ever!
attributes.name: Maria
